verbs.description: [ARG1: This strange — but insane — tale] [V: begins] [ARG2: with Erick Erickson wandering the aisles of a Safeway supermarket] . He 's accompanied by a Republican congressman who regularly appears on Fox News to defend President Donald Trump . " If we 're going to lose because of him , we might as well impeach the motherfucker , " the unnamed
